titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to exempt small manufacturers, producers, and importers from the firearms excise tax.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S16763)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 11/20/1993--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exempt manufacturers, producers, and importers of fewer than 50 firearms per year from the firearms excise tax.
